meanings.definition: A plant of the valerian family with small white flowers, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The allheals plant has tiny white blooms that are beneficial for health.
meanings.sent2: Many herbalists believe in the healing properties of allheals.
meanings.sent3: The allheals plant decided to open a health clinic for other plants.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, allheals stands tall as the ultimate healer.
meanings.sent5: The scent of allheals filled the air, promising wellness and vitality.

meanings.definition: A remedy or cure for all ailments.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's chicken soup is known as the allheals for colds and flu.
meanings.sent2: Some people search for an allheals solution to their health problems.
meanings.sent3: The allheals potion was so powerful, it even fixed the broken clock.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is the allheals that can mend a broken heart.
meanings.sent5: Hope is the ultimate allheals, bringing light to the darkest times.
